data.title: Agustin Masuelli on LinkedIn: Elias Sandler, CEO of Kinoa (LiveOps platform), discussed why many mobile…
data.meta_description: Check out the new episode of Story Mode by Sanlo
data.text:
The Sanlo team had an amazing time at our annual offsite in Austin, Texas. As a fully remote org, it's important for the entire team to get together at least once a year for some bonding. We kayaked 🚣♀️, went to a FC Austin game ⚽, rode horses 🏇, went to Top Golf ⛳, ate 🍖, and drank 🍻. And we did a little work as well. 😎

David Gardner / Lvp thanks for chatting with me! From what David's personal story in gaming (a really cool one by the way) to habits successful founders share to what's invest-able now to trends to watch. "You've got to make tough calls and move fast. That's probably the one advantage that a start up has. It's a rapid strike force, it's not a super tanker. Super tankers have different advantages and you've got to really play to those strengths. Learning, adapting, making progress and having a really good fast cadence and making those course corrections along the way are key." 👀 YouTube --> https://lnkd.in/dH2Gs6E2 🎧 Apple Podcasts --> https://lnkd.in/d3uT7qfY 🎧 Spotify --> https://lnkd.in/dsMUprAf #gamingVC #venturecapital #financinggames #gamingindustry #videogames #aiingaming #lvp

Webshops are becoming very popular in mobile gaming, as they boost revenues as much as 25% by avoiding Apple & Google fees. You need to drive high volumes of player traffic to max out your webshop's success. In our latest blog post, we breakdown tactics that drive players to a webshop without triggering commissions, including: Community & social media - flex your community by adding webshop promotions into your cadence of posts across all your social accounts and communities. In-game promotions without any direct links (EU only) - alert players with discounts, exclusives, and offers available on your webshop, but don’t link directly out as that will trigger commissions. SEO - Be ready to catch those people who are actively looking for your webshop. Retargeting - Target your current active players and drive them directly to your webshop; scale will be limited, but strong ROAS is very possible. Read the full blog post and sign up for our waitlist below. We're are working on something big. Read the full post —> https://lnkd.in/gzXJdZw5

We're excited to announce our $10m Series A round and $200m fund to provide non-dilutive capital to game and app developers. We spoke with Aisha Malik from TechCrunch to share what we are working and why we couldn't be more excited about building more products to empower developers through finance! Check out the full article 👉 https://lnkd.in/dgsQ92Zv We're happy to welcome Josh Chapman and Konvoy Ventures as our lead investor and have support of all of our seed investors (Ken Lamb Marielle Ednalino Kristian Segerstrale Ross Fubini Chauncey Kerr Hamilton David Gardner Harry Hamer Stephanie Choo Ricky L. Leo Liu Mark Goldberg), welcome new investors (Logan Allin Teppei Tsutsui Christian Ostberg) and all the amazing angels who've incredible supporters throughout our journey! #sanlo #techcrunch #gamedev #appdev #money #fintech
